subject: What is the best solution to test Web Services(not normal web app) public APIs?
msgSnippet: Hi My previous post was not clear so re-do it now. The Web Services I am prefering to the new technology with SOAP/XML, not normal web applications. Web
messageBody:
Hi

My previous post was not clear so re-do it now. The Web Services I am
prefering to the new technology with SOAP/XML, not normal web
applications.

Web Services need to expose certain public APIs to outside. What is
the best way to test it out? Static Stub, or SOAP over HTTP, is there
some specific tools or how do you do it now?

Jirong
